description:
This side-release buckle can be swapped in to replace broken buckles in the field using only a screwdriver. The strong stainless steel pin means the buckle can be used as a permanent replacement, with no need to re-sew any webbing loops after you get home.

  • Stainless steel pins are strong and corrosion resistant
  • Can be replaced in the field using a screwdriver
  • Serves as a permanent fix
  • Available in 15mm, 20mm, 25mm and 38mm widths
name: Sea To Summit Field Repair Buckle Side Release - 1 Pin
